[IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img][URL=http://rune-union.com]HOME[/URL] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/keaq9g.png[/img][URL=http://rune-union.com/forums]FORUMS[/URL] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5tuon8.png[/img][URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/http://rune-union.com/webclient/]WEBCLIENT[/URL] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/j6qro3.png[/img][URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/http://rune-union.com/]WEBSITE[/URL]
Hi Guys,
Thanks for viewing the advertisment thread for Rune-Union we are currently working on making everything better and are up and running with a very high demand!
NOTEABLE FEATURES:
-Player Owned Shops -Dungeoneering (Co-Op) -Construction-Build your own house -Trivia Rewards with shops -Trivia -Player-Driven Economy -Online 24/7 -DDoS Protected -All Skills Working -Friendly Staff Team -Dedicated -One of a Kind -120 Max Levels (169 max combat) -Customizable Client + All original matrix features -Automated double xp weekends -Donor Bonus XP -No Lag, No Downtime - Super fast 4GB Dedicated Server - Custom Zombies Minigame - Now features Clue Scrolls - Over 20 Titles to Unlock with various requirements - Cosmetic Overrides - Skilling Rewards - PVM Based with GREAT Eco - 3 Dungeons + Daemonheim (All Custom!) - Choose your own exp rate, 5 to choose from! - Custom rewarding Achievements system - 5 man co-op Dungeoneering (all 60 floors) - Full Ring of Kinship - Construction - Grand Exchange - Farming - All Skills Working - Multiple agility courses - Less crashing, more play time - Super Stable - Great Economy - Decent Exp Rates
Come Join Today To Find Out More.
